amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the adverse condemnation of property.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 106-612 to ensure that landowners are not forced to sell their property, and that all landowners are treated fairly in the process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Calvert amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 261 (Roll no. 172).
